Key Match Events: Chris Sale won his major league-leading 15th game with six crisp innings
Matt Olson hit an RBI double and Luke Williams added a two-run double in a four-run seventh that broke the game open
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Twins had runners at second and third with no outs and the bases loaded with one out, but they failed to score
Others: The Twins fell 3 1/2 games behind Cleveland in the AL Central
Kansas City is one game back
Minnesota has a three-game lead on Boston for the final wild card spot
